data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Not enough people in our country recycle their items. Besides ____ like ____ and ____, ____ can ____ recycle ____ and ____. If ____ would ____ do ____ part ____ our ____ would ____ much ____. Besides, items would be cheaper since companies could use recycled materials.
data.partBlankContent: Not enough people in our country recycle their items. Besides thi___ like ca__ and bot____, o__ can al__ recycle clo____ and appli_____. If ever_____ would ju__ do th___ part th__ our envir______ would b_ much cle____. Besides, items would be cheaper since companies could use recycled materials.
data.answer: 我们国家没有足够的人回收他们的物品。除了易拉罐和瓶子，人们还可以回收衣服和电器。如果每个人都尽自己的一份力，那么我们的环境就会干净得多。此外，由于公司可以使用回收材料，物品会更便宜。
